page.title: 08Week-end Activities.
page.content: Our class of 6 to 8 year old children found out what its members did during a June week-end.Although a wide range of activities,food and mealtimes were recorded,the following seems to be a typical week-end for the children in the class. On Saturday they generally got up at 8.00 a.m.and had a cereal breakfast.The morning was spent playing outside or shopping and at 12.00 to 1.00 o,clock they had a sandwich lunch.In the afternoon they played or visited a local fete and then sat down for an evening meal of sausages or salad at 5.00p.m. After watching the television they went to bed between 8.00 and 9.00p.m.
